about_the_game:
Brave warriors, meet the interstellar challenge

"Star Dawn: Survivors" is a survivor-like game that takes you into an interstellar wilderness full of unknowns and challenges. Here, you will transform into a brave warrior, equipped with advanced high-tech weapons, to fight against endless enemies. Every battle is full of tension and excitement, and every enemy may be a huge obstacle on your way forward. You need to use the weapons and strategies in your hands to defeat those ferocious enemies and win a chance of survival.

Explore the unknown and discover precious treasures

Explore the mysterious interstellar wilderness and discover precious treasures hidden beneath the surface. Your mission is not only to survive, but also to dig out the most precious resources in this unknown land. These treasures can not only bring you immediate benefits, but also help you unlock powerful upgrades to improve your combat effectiveness and survivability. Every dig is an adventure, every discovery a surprise. You need to keep moving forward, explore more unknown areas, and find more treasures.

Tenacity and wisdom make a true survivor

In this dangerous interstellar wilderness, only tenacity and wisdom can allow you to survive. You need to face unprecedented challenges and overcome various difficulties in order to become a true survivor. Are you ready? Embark on this adventure, face unknown challenges, and become the bravest warrior in the interstellar dawn.

"Star Dawn: Survivors" looks forward to your joining, let us conquer this mysterious interstellar wilderness together and create your own legend!

name: Stellar Dawn: Survivor

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 Or Later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 4000 series or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 750 or equivalent, integrated graphics not supported
  • Additional Notes: 64-bit Recommended, 32-bit Supported
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4000 series or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 or equivalent, integrated graphics not supported
  • Additional Notes: 64-bit Recommended, 32-bit Supported

short_description: "Star Dawn: Survivors" is a survivor-like game. You will transform into a brave warrior and use high-tech weapons to fight against endless enemies. Explore the mysterious interstellar wilderness, and constantly unlock powerful upgrades to enhance your combat effectiveness.
supported_languages: English, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Korean
